meanings.definition: The state of being without water.
meanings.sent1: The waterlessness in the desert was extreme.
meanings.sent2: The village suffered from waterlessness during the drought.
meanings.sent3: The waterlessness of the swimming pool made it impossible to swim.
meanings.sent4: Her throat felt like waterlessness after hours of talking.
meanings.sent5: The waterlessness of the well left the villagers desperate for a solution.
